mapper.select: SELECT m_buyer_id, m_item_id, m_price_id, m_price_price, m_price_unit, m_price_discount, m_price_startPeriod, m_price_lastPeriod, m_price_lastPrice, m_price_inserted FROM m_price ORDER BY m_price_id DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_price ( m_price_startPeriod, m_price_lastPeriod, m_price_unit, m_price_discount, m_price_lastPrice, m_price_price, m_price_inserted, m_buyer_id, m_item_id ) VALUES ( #{m_price_startPeriod}, #{m_price_lastPeriod}, #{m_price_unit}, #{m_price_discount}, #{m_price_lastPrice}, #{m_price_price}, NOW(), #{m_buyer_id}, #{m_item_id} )
